channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: 'Bachelor in Paradise' finale tonight: Here's who's rumored to win
item.description: Grab your roses and wine glasses; we finally reached the end of"Bachelor in Paradise" season 10.

item.title: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 34: Florida-based influencer to join
item.description: Goodbye reality dating competitions, hello realitydancingcompetitions!

item.title: Florida football moves up in coaches poll after Week 1 win vs LIU
item.description: Florida footballmoved up two spots to No. 15 15 in theUS LBM Coaches Pollreleased on Sept. 2.

item.title: Vote for the Herald-Tribune Girls Athlete of the Week for Aug. 25-30
item.description: Each week the Herald-Tribune staff will select nominees for theHerald-Tribune Girls Athlete of the Week pollsponsored by Central Florida Behavioral Network, Inc. Nominees are derived from scores and stats emailed in by Sarasota and Manatee county coaches during the week tohtincoming@gmail.com. Readers can then votein the online pollto determine the Girls Athlete of the Week.

item.title: Vote for the Herald-Tribune Boys Athlete of the Week for Aug. 25-30
item.description: Each week The Herald-Tribune staff will select nominees for the Herald-Tribune Boys Athlete of the Week poll sponsored by Central Florida Behavioral Network, Inc. Nominees are derived from scores and stats emailed in by Sarasota and Manatee county coaches during the week tohtincoming@gmail.com. Readers can then vote in the online poll to determine the Boys Athlete of the Week.

item.title: Businesses buy in to innovative workforce housing project in Bradenton
item.description: Charlie Balliette remembers the day about a year ago when he heard a proposal that he knew would help his employees.

item.title: Gator hatchling season: What to do if an alligator is on…
item.description: If you've lived in Florida for long enough, you likely know thatcoexisting with alligatorsis a part of life in the Sunshine State. As long as you keep your distance and never feed one if it crosses your path, you should be fine.

item.title: Florida Lottery Mega Millions, Jackpot Triple Play…
item.description: TheFlorida Lotteryoffers several draw games for those hoping to win one of the available jackpots. Here’s a look at the winning numbers for games played on Tuesday, Sept. 2, 2025

item.title: Here's the 2025 team-by-team Sarasota and Manatee high…
item.description: The 2025 high school football season begins with Florida High School Athletic Association Kickoff Classics on Aug. 14. The regular season begins Aug. 21 and runs through Oct. 31 (with the exception of IMG which will play into November) with most teams playing 10 games in 11 weeks.

item.title: Here's the weekly 2025 Sarasota and Manatee high school…
item.description: The 2025 high school football season begins with Florida High School Athletic Association Kickoff Classics on Aug. 14. The regular season begins Aug. 21 and runs through Oct. 31 (with the exception of IMG which will play into November) with most teams playing 10 games in 11 weeks.

item.title: Your guide to the 2025 Sarasota, Manatee high school…
item.description: From preseason practices through the state championship games, theHerald-Tribunewill be covering the high school football season every step of the way.

item.title: Sarasota Police: Weekend shooting leaves woman dead, man injured
item.description: Sarasota Police officers havearrested a man in connection with a fatal shootingthat killed one person and seriously injured another over the Labor Day holiday weekend.

item.title: Former Sarasota pet groomer banned from animal work while on probation
item.description: The former owner of a Sarasota dog grooming business who was arrested in March 2024 for mistreating animals at her shop has pleaded no contest to five misdemeanor charges of animal cruelty and sentenced to five years of probation.

item.title: Who is Michael Fuino, North Port's top choice for city attorney?
item.description: NORTH PORT – Michael Fuino, a senior assistant city attorney for the city of Clearwater, will be North Port'snext city attorney,pending the outcome of negotiations with Mayor Phil Stokes.

item.title: Sarasota real estate attorney Jim Turner appointed to Swiftmud board
item.description: Jim Turner, a prominent Sarasota real estate attorney and one of the owners ofHi Hat Ranch, has been appointed byGov. Ron DeSantisto the Southwest Florida Water Management District’s Governing Board.
